description: Construct an SQL agent from an LLM and tools.

llm.info: An LLM Model Object (It can be found in any LLM Component).

database_uri.info: URI to connect to the SQL database (e.g., sqlite:///path/to/db.db or postgresql://user:pass@host:port/db).

extra_tools.info: Additional tools to provide to the agent for enhanced functionality.
